page.title: 06A GREENISLAND GIRL'S DAY(2)
page.content: I love music so part of most days is taken up by practising on my violin. Recently I've been singing and playing the recorder too as I've been preparing for the Carrick Festival.All the extra work has been worth it because I won a cup and a medal. The day I enjoy most is Thursday _ that's swimming day at school and in the evenings I meet my friends at Girl Guides. All too soon it is the time I hate _ 9 o'clock _ time for bed.Isn't it funny that the bed you don't want to get out of in the morning is the same one you don't want to get into at night?
